# Classic Dishes

Sausages are very British and usually appear in British dishes.

1. **Bangers and Mash**: sausages and mashed potato served with peas
2. **Pigs in Blankets**: wrap sausage with bacon rashers, oven cook
3. **Toad in the Hole**: oven cooked sausages with Yorkshire pudding batter. Serve with peas


# Varieties

- [Cumberland sausage](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cumberland_sausage)
- [Lincolnshire Sausage](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lincolnshire_sausage)
- [Chipolata](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chipolata)


# Storage

- Fresh meat needs to be kept refrigerated. Once opened use within 2 days.
- Meat is freezable. Once frozen use within 2 months.
